Posted By: Dragon_Nut (1/23/2011 7:45:42 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: If I have a 7/7 lump of green goo for a beatstick, I'd want to be using him to beat people, not to block and untap my other stuff. Still, the Snake Offering allows for some interesting shenanigans, especially with untapping all your lands if you're mono-green. Those sorts of interesting choices seem to go against the 'all upside' cards that Wizards is so fond of, which I personally find a bit disappointing. Overall, a really neat card.
posts.html:
